Alpharetta.National Christian Foundation: National Christian Foundation (NCF) is a US non-profit organization that helps donors give more wisely and tax-efficiently to support their favorite charitable causes. NCF is a leader in accepting non-cash assets (for example stocks, real estate, and business interests), and is the nation's largest provider of donor-advised funds focused primarily on Christian givers. In 2015, NCF was ranked as the 9th largest non-profit organization in the United States and distributed its seven billionth grant dollar.
